column1: In the context of this case, two questions have arisen to be addressed before this Court. The

column2: is  that  whether  the  document  marked  as  6R4  is  a  valid  document  for

column1: nomination in terms of the Land Development Ordinance. The 1st Respondent had taken a
decision based on the document marked as 6R4 and arrived at a decision that both the 6th
Respondent and the Petitioner are the successors to the land in question.
